com.basistech.tclre

Class HsrePattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basistech.tclre.HsrePattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RePattern

    public class HsrePattern
extends Object
implements RePattern
    A compiled regular expression. The method compile(String, PatternFlags...) serves as the factory.
    See Also:
    RePattern, ReMatcher
